Html:
Hi,

I have installed the AdventureWorksDBCI.msi and the AdventureWorksLT.msi and when I wa trying to attach the databases I am keep getting an error message saying
" Could not find row in sysindexes for database ID 7, object ID 1, index ID 1. Run DBCC CHECKTABLE on sysindexes.
Could not open new database 'AdventureWorks'. CREATE DATABASE is aborted. (Microsoft SQL Server, Error: 602) "

I have sql server 2005 enterprise installed in my PC also my Operating system is XP Professional with SP2.

Can some one help me with this problem please. Thank you!!

Good morning,
Please help!!
I am strugling with my SQL Server 2005 management studio. In fact I have installed
AdventureWorksDB.msi on my computer. I use Window XP SP2 (Home).
the problem is that when I open the
MICROSOFT SQL SERVER MANAGEMENT STUDIO EXPRESS, I cannot stil see the
AdventureWorks in the PRJECT EXPLORER. but when search AdventureWorks in the
hard disk (C:\) , the AdventureWorks is there under C:\programfiles\mssql\data.
Iwonder if you could tell me how it can display in the object explorer.

Please help!

Are you sure you downloaded the sample database installers from the appropriate page? The default installers are for SQL Server 2008. Please see our FAQ for how to locate the SQL Server 2005 sample database installers.
